name: Remember Jane Fonda? Online Trivia | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Fonda starred in "Klute". What type of character did she play?
questions.explanation:
Call Girl.

	With Donald Sutherland. Fonda played Bree Daniels.

questions.text: Fonda also starred in "Julia". The movie was based on some autobiographical material that was provided by what writer?
questions.explanation:
Lillian Hellman.

	Hellman's reminiscence of her friend, Julia, provided the raw material for this fine movie. Fonda played Hellman; Vanessa Redgraveplayed Julia. Directed by Fred Zinnemann.

questions.text: Fonda starred in "The China Syndrome". One of the key characters dies at the end. How?
options: He is forced off the road while driving
questions.explanation:
He is shot.

	One of Fonda's best movies. It's a nice suspenseful piece - with Jack Lemmon and (early) Michael Douglas.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Jane Fonda in "Sunday in New York"?
questions.explanation:
Rod Taylor.

	Cute comedy. Also with Robert Culp and Cliff Robertson.

questions.text: Fonda starred with her father (and Katharine Hepburn) in "On Golden Pond". Which of the following is true of the movie?
questions.correct: It was based on a play
options: It was based on a novel
It was written originally for the screen
It was expanded from an original short story
questions.explanation:
It was based on a play.

	After the success on Broadway, the play was turned into a movie.

questions.text: Fonda starred in "Cat Ballou". Who was NOT in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Tony Curtis.

	Big career role for Marvin. Kaye and Cole were the singing troubadours.

questions.text: In "The Morning After", Fonda wakes up after a drinking binge with a problem. What is it?
questions.correct: She is with a  dead man
questions.explanation:
She is with a  dead man.

	With Jeff Bridges. Not one of her best.

questions.text: Fonda starred in "Barefoot in the Park". Who played her "curious" neighbor?
questions.explanation:
Charles Boyer.

	With Robert Redford. From the Neil Simon play.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Jane Fonda movie?
questions.explanation:
Inside Daisy Clover.

	"Daisy" is a Natalie Wood movie. "Home" is a story of  returning Vietnam veterans; it co-starred Bruce Dern and Jon Voight. "Rollover" co-starred Kris Kristofferson; it didn't do well at the box office. "Gringo" was a mediocre "western" with Gregory Peck.

questions.text: Which of these does NOT include Jane Fonda in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Love With the Proper Stranger.

	"Love" starred Natalie Wood. "Horseman" co-starred Robert Redford in the title role. "Barbarella" was a campy sci-fi effort by her then-husband, Roger Vadim. "Chapman" was early in her career.
